context_bundle.summary: PAD version history and changelog 2024-2025. Key releases: 2508 WebDriver browser automation, 2411 Cloud connectors GA + Power Fx GA, 2408 dynamic subflows, 2407 Excel cell colors, 2401 Word actions + blank values. No Robin action deprecations - only cloud connector deprecations

onboarding.quick_start: Current: 2508 (2.59.x). Check version: PAD console Help > About. Auto-updates via Microsoft Store or manual installer from MS download center
common_patterns: 2508: WebDriver browser automation (preview) - no extension needed
2411: Cloud connectors GA, Power Fx flows GA, CyberArk credentials
2408: Dynamic subflow invocation via 'Input as expression', Log 10K chars (was 128)
2407: Set color of cells Excel action, Go To cross-scope labels
2403: Clear cells Excel action, Power Fx IntelliSense
2401: Word actions, Create HTML content, Blank values support, SAP Attach
known_errors: No Robin syntax deprecations - all classic actions still supported
Cloud connector deprecations don't affect desktop actions
Personal MS accounts deprecated in cloud only - PAD desktop unaffected
SQL Server V1 connector deprecated June 2025 - use V2
